level.heading: DECORUM OF MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC (ยง 7-1526)

level.text: The Chairman shall maintain order in the meeting room, and if in the Chairman’s opinion the removal of any member of the public is necessary for the maintenance of order, the Chairman may, after warning, order the Sergeant-At-Arms to remove any disorderly person.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10807 (November 29, 2002).
